page.title: 04Weston Shore
page.content: The shore at Weston has a long shingle beach and looks out over the famous Southampton Water.The beach itself isn't exactly clean but on the other hand it's not too bad and many people go fishing or sailing or sail boarding along the shore. Once people would have looked out from here to watch the ships coming and going from Southampton but now there are few ships to watch.With leisure activities growing though there are many things to see happening along the shore ,especially at weekends. Behind the open space along the shoreline is the Weston Council estate with 5 giant blocks of flats looking out over the water.You need a good view because it's lonely living up in the sky.
